section.programlisting: 570 { 571 vec3 v1 = {2.0f, -3.0f, 4.0f}, 572 v2 = {-3.0f, 4.0f, -5.0f}, 573 v3, v4; 574 575 GLM(vec3_negate_to)(v1, v3); 576 GLM(vec3_negate_to)(v2, v4); 577 578 ASSERT(test_eq(-v1[0], v3[0])) 579 ASSERT(test_eq(-v1[1], v3[1])) 580 ASSERT(test_eq(-v1[2], v3[2])) 581 582 ASSERT(test_eq(-v2[0], v4[0])) 583 ASSERT(test_eq(-v2[1], v4[1])) 584 ASSERT(test_eq(-v2[2], v4[2])) 585 586 TEST_SUCCESS 587 }

section.programlisting: 802 { 803 vec3 v1 = {1.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f}, v2 = {1.0f, 1.0f, 1.0f}; 804 805 /* rotate X around Y = -Z */ 806 GLM(vec3_rotate)(v1, GLM_PI_2f, GLM_YUP); 807 808 ASSERT(test_eq(v1[0], 0.0f)) 809 ASSERT(test_eq(v1[1], 0.0f)) 810 ASSERT(test_eq(v1[2], -1.0f)) 811 812 /* rotate -Z around X = Y */ 813 GLM(vec3_rotate)(v1, GLM_PI_2f, GLM_XUP); 814 815 ASSERT(test_eq(v1[0], 0.0f)) 816 ASSERT(test_eq(v1[1], 1.0f)) 817 ASSERT(test_eq(v1[2], 0.0f)) 818 819 /* rotate Y around Z = -X */ 820 GLM(vec3_rotate)(v1, GLM_PI_2f, GLM_ZUP); 821 822 ASSERT(test_eq(v1[0], -1.0f)) 823 ASSERT(test_eq(v1[1], 0.0f)) 824 ASSERT(test_eq(v1[2], 0.0f)) 825 826 /* rotate v2 around Y by 90deg */ 827 GLM(vec3_rotate)(v2, GLM_PI_2f, GLM_YUP); 828 829 ASSERT(test_eq(v2[0], 1.0f)) 830 ASSERT(test_eq(v2[1], 1.0f)) 831 ASSERT(test_eq(v2[2], -1.0f)) 832 833 /* rotate v2 around Y by 90deg */ 834 GLM(vec3_rotate)(v2, GLM_PI_2f, GLM_YUP); 835 836 ASSERT(test_eq(v2[0], -1.0f)) 837 ASSERT(test_eq(v2[1], 1.0f)) 838 ASSERT(test_eq(v2[2], -1.0f)) 839 840 /* rotate v2 around Y by 90deg */ 841 GLM(vec3_rotate)(v2, GLM_PI_2f, GLM_YUP); 842 843 ASSERT(test_eq(v2[0], -1.0f)) 844 ASSERT(test_eq(v2[1], 1.0f)) 845 ASSERT(test_eq(v2[2], 1.0f)) 846 847 /* rotate v2 around X by 90deg */ 848 GLM(vec3_rotate)(v2, GLM_PI_2f, GLM_XUP); 849 850 ASSERT(test_eq(v2[0], -1.0f)) 851 ASSERT(test_eq(v2[1], -1.0f)) 852 ASSERT(test_eq(v2[2], 1.0f)) 853 854 /* rotate v2 around Z by 90deg */ 855 GLM(vec3_rotate)(v2, GLM_PI_2f, GLM_ZUP); 856 857 ASSERT(test_eq(v2[0], 1.0f)) 858 ASSERT(test_eq(v2[1], -1.0f)) 859 ASSERT(test_eq(v2[2], 1.0f)) 860 861 TEST_SUCCESS 862 }

section.programlisting: 931 { 932 vec3 v1 = {1.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f}, v2 = {1.0f, 1.0f, 1.0f}; 933 mat4 x0, y0, z0; 934 mat3 x, y, z; 935 936 glm_rotate_make(x0, GLM_PI_2f, GLM_XUP); 937 glm_rotate_make(y0, GLM_PI_2f, GLM_YUP); 938 glm_rotate_make(z0, GLM_PI_2f, GLM_ZUP); 939 940 glm_mat4_pick3(x0, x); 941 glm_mat4_pick3(y0, y); 942 glm_mat4_pick3(z0, z); 943 944 /* rotate X around Y = -Z */ 945 GLM(vec3_rotate_m3)(y, v1, v1); 946 947 ASSERT(test_eq(v1[0], 0.0f)) 948 ASSERT(test_eq(v1[1], 0.0f)) 949 ASSERT(test_eq(v1[2], -1.0f)) 950 951 /* rotate -Z around X = Y */ 952 GLM(vec3_rotate_m3)(x, v1, v1); 953 954 ASSERT(test_eq(v1[0], 0.0f)) 955 ASSERT(test_eq(v1[1], 1.0f)) 956 ASSERT(test_eq(v1[2], 0.0f)) 957 958 /* rotate Y around Z = -X */ 959 GLM(vec3_rotate_m3)(z, v1, v1); 960 961 ASSERT(test_eq(v1[0], -1.0f)) 962 ASSERT(test_eq(v1[1], 0.0f)) 963 ASSERT(test_eq(v1[2], 0.0f)) 964 965 /* rotate v2 around Y by 90deg */ 966 GLM(vec3_rotate_m3)(y, v2, v2); 967 968 ASSERT(test_eq(v2[0], 1.0f)) 969 ASSERT(test_eq(v2[1], 1.0f)) 970 ASSERT(test_eq(v2[2], -1.0f)) 971 972 /* rotate v2 around Y by 90deg */ 973 GLM(vec3_rotate_m3)(y, v2, v2); 974 975 ASSERT(test_eq(v2[0], -1.0f)) 976 ASSERT(test_eq(v2[1], 1.0f)) 977 ASSERT(test_eq(v2[2], -1.0f)) 978 979 /* rotate v2 around Y by 90deg */ 980 GLM(vec3_rotate_m3)(y, v2, v2); 981 982 ASSERT(test_eq(v2[0], -1.0f)) 983 ASSERT(test_eq(v2[1], 1.0f)) 984 ASSERT(test_eq(v2[2], 1.0f)) 985 986 /* rotate v2 around X by 90deg */ 987 GLM(vec3_rotate_m3)(x, v2, v2); 988 989 ASSERT(test_eq(v2[0], -1.0f)) 990 ASSERT(test_eq(v2[1], -1.0f)) 991 ASSERT(test_eq(v2[2], 1.0f)) 992 993 /* rotate v2 around Z by 90deg */ 994 GLM(vec3_rotate_m3)(z, v2, v2); 995 996 ASSERT(test_eq(v2[0], 1.0f)) 997 ASSERT(test_eq(v2[1], -1.0f)) 998 ASSERT(test_eq(v2[2], 1.0f)) 999 1000 TEST_SUCCESS 1001 }
